Hang in there.  I know I'm hoping for the best with this project.
Technolog=
y is always changing [damn it] and no sooner we learn how to
manipulate one=
 dynamics, here comes another even more complicated to
learn.  After my 10+=
 years of working as a web host, I'm ready to go to
the lulu bin after then=
 introduction of all sorts of new scripts.  I've
gotten to the point of was=
hing my hands entirely of it and sticking to
just doing graphics for the cl=
ients.

Anyway, I'm soooo looking forward to the new site and the informati=
on
that will be available to everyone.  I'm so glad you're willing to
sacri=
fice your time to this effort.  THANKS, on behalf of ALL the
Shinsengumi-ai=
!
